website_summaries.verdict: With leaf-like etchings that look great with any fresh or artificial flowers you put inside, this sturdy vase will make a nice addition to your home decor.
pros: Suitable for displaying large bouquets and long-stemmed flowers, thanks to the wide opening and 11-inch design
We love the etchings that resemble leaves
Has a heavy, stable feel and attractive look
cons: The box it arrives in is common-looking and flimsy, so you'll have to purchase prettier packaging if you plan to give it as a gift

customer_reviews.title: 20 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Omg it's beautiful and heavy. For those wondering if this is real crystal it is. It says it right on the box. Its also lead free. For those womder if it was really made in Italy it is. Also written right on the box. I took pictures to prove it. Its amazing. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mrabet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful vase. The shape is beautiful, too, and also helps to fan out bouquets of flowers. I definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Loves-books

customer_reviews.title: Nice vase but not a decent gift because of the old ripped poor original vase box.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a crystal vase as a gift for my friend. I wasn't sure if this one is a good choice so I decided to get one for myself first. I just received today. The vase is gorgeous but the original vase box is old and shabby. It looks like it's returned by someone before. You cannot say it's brand new at all! Even though I was so disappointed about that , I still want to keep the vase! I just love its simple elegant design. As the gift for my friend, I will buy a Waterford one from Macys.com.
customer_reviews.author: J. Luo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous vase, and it holds about 2 dozen carnations! So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: 24caberneigh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty vase
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I feel it was a good value. I gave it as a thank you gift
customer_reviews.author: girl

customer_reviews.title: Lots of wow factor, great value
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have great expensive crystal and this vase is gorgeous. Extra large and makes for such an attractive flower presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Mariet cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous vase, a bit too expensive for the price
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous vase, a bit too expensive for the price. I love it very much and it’s perfect for what I need it for but... too pricey
customer_reviews.author: Q M

customer_reviews.title: I am so sad! I really like the vase!
customer_reviews.text: Today is my Birthday and I received a lot of flowers. I used my new vase for a first time. I put the flower in a vase and later on I saw a big paddle on the table. When I check the bottom I saw a large crack . I am so sad! I don’t have the original box to return it. 😢It really ruined my Birthday! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: maya boytcheva

customer_reviews.title: Item came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged when I opened it. Top lip was cracked and tiny pieces were inside the vase
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but high price.
customer_reviews.text: Though it was a little high on price after getting it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: It is not big enough at all.
customer_reviews.text: If looks can be deceiving this is definitely that product, looks like a nice big vasue but it clearly is not, definitely not worth $55.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J Murph Jr

customer_reviews.title: Solid, but with multiple imperfections
customer_reviews.text: It felt solid and sturdy, but had multiple imperfections (air bubbles?) that I have never seen in any other crystal before. A couple are visible in the picture. It made me question the authenticity of this item. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: FLNYCA

customer_reviews.title: It split in half
customer_reviews.text: This vase cracked evenly when being washed with warm water. I can send a picture. It literally split in half
customer_reviews.author: steve lambert

customer_reviews.title: No brainer must buy it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful makes any flower you put in it gorgeous. Would be a great present for anyone looking for a truly amazing gift.The detail in the glass looks like leaves and stems of a flower.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Nave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vase for a wedding gift, as as other reviewers have said, the box from the manufacturer was slightly mangled. We had to find a new box to wrap it in. The vase itself was beautiful and I'm sure the bride and groom will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn and Sue

customer_reviews.title: Lacking shipping and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great vase but it came with a small chip and the box was tore. This was intended as a gift and we had to keep it instead because of the condition.
customer_reviews.author: David Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!! Looks great on my kitchen table. Perfect for long stem roses.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vase ♥️
customer_reviews.text: I love this vase. It’s dreamy to gaze at. Extremely happy I purchased this instead of something much more pricey. How much prettier can a vase get?!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey D.

customer_reviews.title: Breathtaking Crystal Vase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. Thick crystal. Phenomenal detailing. Highly giftable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Radelet

customer_reviews.title: This is a very high quality product which I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: He was an anniversary gift for my wife and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Over Hyped
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as pretty as I thought this should be for the price. Over hyped.
customer_reviews.author: Rockhound

customer_reviews.title: Super Gorgeous, Heavy, Detailed & PEFECT Vase!!!!!!!!!  ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't expect this vase to be so beautiful!!!!! This is a very heavy (7 lbs!), very detailed with gorgeous cuts and etchings and very sleek vase!!!!!! When I opened the box, I was just floored at the quality!!!!!!! I set it next to my very expensive Waterford and it looks equally as expensive and impressive! I was so happy with this particular Laurus line, I purchased the matching smaller 10' Flare Vase, 13' Oval Bowl and 12' Centerpiece Bowl. I have found my new favorite "crystal"!!!!!!!!! You really can't miss with this vase. Would make a perfect wedding, anniversary, birthday, any occasion gift!!!!!!!!!! ♥ I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Make the Purchase, omit the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! This is my 2nd order. Don't pay any attention to the negative reviews. Evidently they really have nothing positive to say anyway. Purchase this item, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sheila B.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty design & lots of room for flowers.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, thick, durable, clear, design. A little heavy. But I'm very satisfied with this vase. Enough space to put more than a dozen flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Feline Lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crystal vase.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as an anniversary gift, it was beautiful and the couple were delighted, definitely Italian quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous filled or empty.
customer_reviews.text: A very heavy well designed vase. This is a big vase. It's over 11 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: charles closser

customer_reviews.title: Not frosted glass
customer_reviews.text: photo seems to show frosted glass with clear carving, but it was all clear, so I was disappointed. I did not expect it to be so big and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: A very nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift. We were unsure as to the quality when buying on line. It is lovely. Solid nice vase. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet O. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was an engagement gift and everyone liked it very much, including the future groom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RCR Crystal "LAURUS" Vase 11" - Made in Italy
product_meta.description: Color:VaseRCR Laurus Collection Crystal Vase. This modern cut crystal vase is made in the Tuscan region of Italy. Add a timeless and elegant look to your home and your flowers with this crystal vase. Measures 7.75" x 7.75" x 11". Dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Oversized vase, perfect for an entire bouquet
Cut crystal design, works well with any décor
Flared top opening gives your flowers a great look

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
